Test.Comment: ALTER-Statement using column_ref_constraint (REFERENCES <table_name> ON DELETE CASCADE)

Statement.CallString: CREATE TABLE TAB302P_1 ( COL1 INT unique, COL2 CHAR(32), COL3 LONG, COL4 LONG, COL5 VARCHAR, COL6 CHAR, COL7 INT, PRIMARY KEY (COL1, col2))
CREATE TABLE TAB302p_2 ( COL1 CHAR, COL2 CHAR(32), COL3 LONG, COL4 LONG, COL5 CHAR, PRIMARY KEY (COL2))
ALTER TABLE TAB302P_2 ADD (COL6 INT CONSTRAINT constr302p_2 REFERENCES TAB302P_1 (COL1) ON DELETE CASCADE)
SELECT tablename, columnname, fkeyname,reftablename,refcolumnname,rule FROM FOREIGNKEYCOLUMNS WHERE tablename = 'TAB302P_2'
INSERT INTO TAB302P_1 (COL1, COL2, COL3) VALUES (3984, 'b and c and d', 'are letters of the alphabet')
INSERT INTO TAB302P_2 (COL1, COL2, COL6) VALUES ('e', 'is a letter of the alphabet', 3984)
INSERT INTO TAB302P_2 (COL1, COL2) VALUES ('b', 'is also a letter of the alphabet')
DELETE FROM TAB302P_1 WHERE COL1=3984
SELECT COL1, COL2, COL6 FROM TAB302P_2

Row.Value: 'is also a letter of the alphabet'

Statement.CallString: DROP TABLE TAB302P_1
DROP TABLE TAB302P_2

Test.Comment: ALTER-Statement using column_ref_constraint (REFERENCES <table_name> ON DELETE SET NULL) verifying that the database sets the correct values NULL

Statement.CallString: CREATE TABLE TAB303p_1 ( COL1 INT unique, COL2 CHAR(32), COL3 LONG, COL4 LONG, COL5 VARCHAR(80) unique, COL6 CHAR, COL7 INT, PRIMARY KEY (COL1, COL7))
CREATE TABLE TAB303p_2 ( COL1 CHAR, COL2 CHAR(32), COL3 LONG, COL4 LONG, COL5 CHAR, PRIMARY KEY (COL5))
INSERT INTO TAB303P_1 (COL1, COL2, COL5, COL7) VALUES (1470, 'store', 'middle', 0741)
ALTER TABLE TAB303P_2 ADD (COL6 CHAR(80) CONSTRAINT CONSTR303P_2 REFERENCES TAB303P_1 (COL5) ON DELETE SET NULL)
INSERT INTO TAB303P_2 (COL1, COL5, COL6) VALUES ('q', 'v', 'middle')
INSERT INTO TAB303P_2 (COL1, COL5, COL6) VALUES ('v', 'd', 'middle')
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT1 FROM TAB303P_2
DELETE FROM TAB303P_1 WHERE COL5 = 'middle'
SELECT * FROM TAB303P_2
DROP TABLE TAB303P_1
DROP TABLE TAB303P_2

INSERT INTO TAB446P_1 (COL1, COL2, COL3) VALUES (33, 3454, 'bb')

INSERT INTO TAB446P_2 (COL1, COL8) VALUES (23, 'aa' )
